name: sachet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small closed container made of paper or plastic, containing a small amount of something, usually enough for only one occasion: a sachet of sugar Compare

a small plastic or paper package containing a small amount of a liquid or powder, usually enough for only one occasion: a sachet of shampoo
